reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice heavy duty folders.
reviews.reviewText: I liked them a lot multi colors nice but decided to go w/ 1 color for International Students at Tarleton University. Purple school colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Front pocket we can put my kid drawing and very pretty looking!Very thick strong material!Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for IEPs!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using these folders all year to organize my paperwork for IEPs. I am able to slide my checklist in the front to be able to see what needs to be completed for everything to be done. I have been using them and reusing them and expect they will be used for years ahead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like the clear front pocket
reviews.reviewText: I like the plastic vs. paper folders for being sturdy and long lasting. Cannot easily label the front of plastic folders so the clear plastic pocket makes it easy to put a sheet of paper in front describing the contents. Lots of folder colors to add to locating the correct folder in a filing cabinet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we needed for school!
reviews.reviewText: These have been great. My kids go through several folders so having a large pack for a great price, is fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These folders are perfect for outdoor use such as church or other camps where you need to have your folder outside with you. These held up for an entire summer (and will be used again next season) of camp. They were loaded and re-loaded daily. They held up to the outdoor elements as well as the camp leaders and campers. I will definitely purchase these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are standing up to my students abuse! Lol Love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These are meant to last
reviews.reviewText: I really like these folders and they go well with a hanging folder file I had in regards to colors. The colors are vibrant, the plastic seems like it will hold up well and I am hopeful that the front pocket will as well. Only time will tell on that.Overall, for about $1.30 a folder, I think it is a solid buy.
